attributes.additional_details:
Oxygen is a gas which was first discovered by Joseph Priestley, he envisioned a future world where oxygen would be mass produced and used by people as luxury.

Oxygen is essential for humans to live and pure Oxygen (at a LOWER pressure) greatly benefits people’s health For Example, an increase in someone's intake in oxygen will increase a human's brain performance and also increase human's bodily health athleticism and is a good alternative to smoking or drinking alcohol for stress relief.

This is something that has not widely been taken up commercially or promoted by health organisations as an alternative luxury that not only will bring health benefits but can be used for pleasure. We would advocate the government introducing places (oxygen houses) or systems where members of the public can go for the purpose of in taking concentrations of oxygen or making portable equipment available for the public to aid our increasing health problems.
